name: Spaced Painter - The Spaced Mythos Collection

metadata.name: The Keeper Of The Flame Of Consciousness Sceptre
metadata.description:
The Keeper holds The Flame as he burns within that ancestral Fire the Ancestors have gifted to humanity and all beings in the Cosmos. 
Be it at conception, returning to Oneness, or being lost in whichever space and time your soul might find itself in, The Flame Of Consciousness Sceptre awaits only your openness to have it placed over your eyes so that your soul can once again gaze into The Source.  
Mingle with the shamans amongst the fractal fire to be reminded of your divine roots! The elders have spoken, so listen closely.. rekindle your inner Flame and remember. Remember…

Original concept, hand sculpting in VR, 3D environment, Immersive Open AI 3D clips, filming and video editing by Spaced Painter synchronized to the track “The Cave” by Extra Terra.
